name: Commander Bongo - a Two Button Game
name_original: Commander Bongo - a Two Button Game
description:
Commander Bongo is an Endless Runner and Shooter which is played with only two Inputs: Left and Right.

The Controls:

Press Left (or A Key) - move Left

Press Right ( or D Key) - move right

Hold Left and quickly tap Right - move right and shoot

Hold Right and quickly tap Left - move left and shoot

Hold Right and Left - charge your shot

This game was made for the United Game Jam of June 2020 using the following tools:

  • Unity: Game Engine
  • Blender: 3D Modelling
  • Magix Music Maker: Music and Sounds
  • Sfxr: Sounds
  • Aseprite: Creating Palette

THANK YOU for playing Commander Bongo. Rate and/or Comment - I am looking forward to it :)

Short History:

The first idea of this game was a rhythm game: You control your space ship by hitting a left or right bongo. Hence the name Commander Bongo. Turned out that getting the rhythm correctly on time so its a satisfying experience was too hard to get done in a 48 hour Jam. Despite the loss of the initial idea, I am happy with what it became.

Outlook:

I want to add some smaller features after the jam and possibly make a mobile version for iOS. It would be my first publication on the App Store.

PS: I only have a Windows machine, so the Build for Linux and MacOS might not be working all this perfectly.
